about_the_game:
W.A.R. HANGRY: Whales Are Really HANGRY!

Join the whimsical and adventurous world of W.A.R. HANGRY, where evolved penguins fight for survival in a virtual simulation of ancient Antarctica. This unique battle royale game combines eco-friendly themes with fun and engaging gameplay mechanics, providing an unforgettable gaming experience.

Gameplay Overview:

In W.A.R. HANGRY, players take control of intelligent, evolved penguins who compete in a virtual simulation designed to honor their ancestors' struggles on a melting Antarctic battleground. Armed with recycled seafood launchers, players must outsmart both their opponents and the environment to be the last penguin standing.

Key Features:

  • Delightfully Hangry Battles: Engage in non-lethal combat by launching an array of sea delicacies from your trash-turned-treasure arsenal. Use strategy and skill to fill opponents' bellies, causing them to fall asleep.

  • Dynamic Environments: Navigate through dynamic terrains influenced by a real-time weather system. Outsmart your opponents on melting ice, in the sea, and high up in the sky. Dodge predators and avoid environmental hazards.

  • Fish, Feast, and Reload: Boost your health or replenish your ammo by fishing in risky waters or collecting food from the icy shores. Each catch or find enhances your vitality or arms you for battle, making strategic choices crucial for survival.

  • Tailored Tuxedos: Customize your penguin with a variety of quirky accessories and colorful costumes, each offering unique bonuses and gameplay perks.

  • Environmental Enigmas: Solve puzzles and unveil secrets of the icy world to boost your survival skills and uncover hidden treasures.

  • Community and Competition: Dive into a vibrant community of fellow penguin survivors. Engage in seasonal events, challenges, and leaderboards to earn exclusive rewards and bragging rights.

  • Eco-Conscious Adventures: Learn about real-world environmental challenges through in-game events and storylines that reflect the trials faced by wildlife due to climate change.

Story Mode:

Embark on a journey beyond the arena in the story mode, where victorious penguins travel to their home planet and other worlds to cure and restore the environment. This mode adds depth to the gameplay, offering a rich narrative experience alongside the competitive action.

Unique Mechanics:

  • Hunger Management: Manage your penguin's hunger levels carefully. Overfeeding leads to food comas, while starvation causes weakness. Use certain foods to induce regurgitation or to fill up and regain strength.

  • Slide, Dive, and Fly: Slide on ice, dive and porpoise through waves, ride currents, and catch sea birds to soar the skies.

  • Predator Encounters: Launch food at predators to fill their hunger and avoid being eaten. Beware the barnacle hive mind that connects all predators, aiming to drag you to the bottom of the ocean where the Nexus awaits in Davy Jones' Locker.

Platform Availability:

Available soon on PC, with future plans for console and mobile releases.

Join the Adventure:

Step aboard 'The Egg' and into the arena. Welcome to W.A.R. HANGRY—where the stakes are high, and the legacy of a species is celebrated in a spectacular display of strategy and survival. Dive into a frosty world of adventure, where each battle pays homage to the heroic penguins of the past.

Support and Play:

Support the development of W.A.R. HANGRY on our GoFundMe page and join our community on Steam. Together, we can make this unique, eco-conscious gaming experience a reality.

Eco-Friendly Commitment:

Upon full release, a portion of the game's earnings will be dedicated to wildlife preservation and ocean cleanup efforts. By playing W.A.R. HANGRY, you're not just having fun; you're also contributing to a better planet!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Drivers: Ensure that graphics drivers are up to date for best performance. Multiplayer: A stable and fast internet connection is recommended for multiplayer.
